title: The Writer's Almanac for Tuesday, February 1, 2022
description: Poet Langston Hughes was born on this day in 1902, 120 years ago. He said, “Writing is like travelling. It's wonderful to go somewhere, but you get tired of staying.”
itunes:author: Prairie Home Productions
itunes:subtitle: Poet Langston Hughes was born on this day in 1902, 120 years ago. He said, “Writing is like travelling. It's wonderful to go somewhere, but you get tired of staying.”
